title: Dow falls 400 points in broad market sell-off
text:
Dow falls 400 points in broad market sell-off 12:57am IST - 01:57 
Stock investors were spooked by fears solid job growth could lead to a faster rise in interest rates, the release of a controversial memo in Washington, and disappointments from Apple and Google parent Alphabet. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Stock investors were spooked by fears solid job growth could lead to a faster rise in interest rates, the release of a controversial memo in Washington, and disappointments from Apple and Google parent Alphabet.
